install.name: Hoduma - User Sync
install.author: Hoduma.com
install.description: Automatically synchronizes Hoduma user table with Joomla user table as Joomla users are created or deleted.

field.name: isUser
field.label: Assign 'User' level by default?
field.description: Set as Yes to automatically give imported Joomla accounts 'User' level access to Hoduma?

field.name: publishUser
field.label: Should new users be published in Hoduma?
field.description: Set to Yes to autimatically publish new users in Hoduma. If you choose 'No' the user will be imported to Hoduma but will set to unpublished.
